caption: Figure 3: The Cumulative Effect of Different Contrasting Strategies. Starting with Prefix Contrast, new contrasting strategies are incrementally added to assess their cumulative effects.
description: The radar chart visualizes the cumulative impact of different contrasting strategies on model performance across various metrics, showing that adding more strategies generally improves results.

caption: Figure 4: The impact of each contrasting strategy.
description: The radar chart visualizes the contrast accuracy of individual contrasting strategies and their cumulative effect on two alignment tasks (Helpful-Base and Harmless-Base), and three leaderboards (MT-Bench, AlpacaEval 2.0, Arena Hard).
